the best.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the most helpful, most successful etc situation or results that you can achieve
the best.translation[0].definitions[0].e: We all want the best for our children.

the best.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the person or thing that is better than any other
the best.translation[0].definitions[1].e: She’s the best of the new young writers.
